Reviews.Title: “Great!!!”
Reviews.Author: dpb_96
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in this motel a couple of times, and it has always been good. A large motel, but friendly staff and large, comfortable rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Great overnight stay”
Reviews.Author: Marley1891
Reviews.Content: Needed a place to stay with our pet while traveling cross country. The hotel was very accommodating. Our room was very clean and close to an exit for easy access to the outside. Bed was comfortable and staff very friendly. Will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Looking forward to returning”
Reviews.Author: Rob S
Reviews.Content: In town for a conference, we were expecting to stay at a different property, but were very pleased in the last minute change. The room was very clean and well prepared...you can tell that the housekeeping staff takes pride in thier work. There were extra towels already in the room, and consumable items were refilled daily. The beds were very comfortable, and the pillows were better than ours at home! The front desk staff were friendly and helpful, and the breakfast was better that most hotels I've stayed in...a large selection including waffles, boiled eggs, yogurt, breads and more. We will definitely plan on staying here during our yearly visits to Indy.

Reviews.Title: “OK for an overnight stay but a bit of a dump :-)”
Reviews.Author: janeandkevin
Reviews.Content: Pros: good location for travelling, staff seemed very nice for the most part, has a guest laundry which was handy, buffet breakfast wasn't bad, pool was OK, plenty of parking, close to fast food outlets Cons: tired appearance, absolutely stank of cigarettes (even the non-smoking areas), bit of a rough area, located between trailer park and the firework factory, very close to highways, plastic cutlery, noisy aircon

Reviews.Title: “awsome...new beds..nice”
Reviews.Author: lorenzo2011
Reviews.Content: we stayed here ...we love decor of rooms our beds brand new..very clean...will come back...also we like saltwater pool..

Reviews.Title: “Smelly & Outdated”
Reviews.Author: Charlotte_Mel
Reviews.Content: I travel often, so I'm a connoisseur in the subject of subpar hotels. This Best Western was pretty terrible and not even worth the price we paid ($98 or something...). The lobby was fine but even walking down the hallways we noticed that it smelled old and in desperate need of a remodel. Our room smelled thick of deodorizer. We asked for a non-smoking room but halfway though my shower I realized that either smoke was being filtered in from another room OR someone had smoked there previously. We were in too big of a hurry to deal with it, so I just closed the bathroom door before we left for the night. Despite the smell, the bed was old and lumpy. The pillows were the size of throw pillows and very lumpy, too. After waking up though the night because the bed was SO uncomfortable, I figured out I couldn’t get used to the smell either. We finally ended up leaving at 4 am because it was SO BAD. I asked for a full refund, but the owner only gave me $25 back. I did not feel this was satisfactory for how terrible the hotel was but I couldn’t be bothered to argue anymore. I suggest paying an additional $23-$35 per night and staying at a Hampton Inn or something under the Hilton Family!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic people very accomodating”
Reviews.Author: Will1942
Reviews.Content: I do a lot of business in the surrounding area and have found the staff at this Motel incredible, & accomodating at all hours of the day. A great SAFE place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Close to sports venue - good rate - but that is it”
Reviews.Author: kateverod
Reviews.Content: It was in a convenient location, the rate was good and the hotel was ok. We stayed for 3 nights for a sports tournament with the rest of the team. The room was ok - desk area and wifi was there - so that I could work - that was nice. Breakfast lacked fruit - they had old bananas - did not replace on third morning. If you play sports (and they told me they cater to that audience) bananas are really a staple and should always be there for breakfast or to take as a morning snack. When I asked if there was room to check in for an extra night if we won - I was told that we prob would not get a room with 2 beds. A friend called a few minutes later and asked to reserve 4 rooms with 2 beds for 3 nights and were told it was available. Either way - the gentleman either did not tell me the truth or he did not tell my friend the truth.

Reviews.Title: “cool best western nice”
Reviews.Author: jumps2876
Reviews.Content: we stayed at best western crossroads during f1 weekend.place was busy but coustomer service was at the top level, hot breakfast, nice pool, and gold's gym for free. i would stay here and tell all the people i know to stay at this best western. great job and Thank you all the staff and management.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: TomSwift
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on a trip from Dallas to New York. It's on the east side of Indi, which means if you're traveling east, you'll avoid morning rush hour the following morning. The place was clean, the room very spacious. The property was recently remodeled, and it looks great. There is no elevator in the place, which surprised me, but it's only two stories, so the climb is easy. The continental breakfast is typical: cereal, donuts, bagels, coffee (reg and decaf), juice, milk, and fruit. I certainly recommend this place to individuals staying in our traveling through Indianapolis.

Reviews.Title: “Grate stay”
Reviews.Author: catsmessages
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night at this hotel on business. I have experienced stays at three downtown properties and a couple of others limiteds around the loop. The desk clerk was new but very friendly and anxious to make sure I was happy and comfortable. Her conversation with other guests while checking me in made it evident to me she took pride in her job and cared about her guests. The lobby is very sleek and when I got to my room discovered same. Many convenient amenities included. Could tell much of the room is new with some work ongoing. Breakfast was plentiful with hot add ons included and check out was same friendly experience. Hi-speed was included, quick, and even though I was quite a distance from the center of the hotel I had great signal strength with no drop offs to complete three hours of work .Micro, fridge, curved shower rods(I love these things!!) great mattress, bedding, and no highway noise that I noticed completed an overall great experience, good value, and I got points for my stay. Next time I'm in Indy, this is my choice

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Crossroads
HotelInfo.Address: 7610 Old Trails Road, Indianapolis, IN 46219-6740 (Formerly Signature Inn Indianapolis East)
